thread.title: This Really Is the Worst Gift You Could Give
thread.title_full: This Really Is the Worst Gift You Could Give

author: Hemant Mehta
title: This Really Is the Worst Gift You Could Give
text:
« This Atheist’s Obituary from 1889 Is Delightful: The “Infidel” Was “Perfectly Rational to the Last” About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
